mapper.select: SELECT OS_CODE,OS_DATE,OS_STATE,OS_REGION FROM OS WHERE OS_STATE = 'OA' OR OS_STATE = 'OR' OR OS_STATE = 'OF' AND OS_REGION = #{os_region}
SELECT OS_CODE,OS_DATE,OS_REGION FROM OS WHERE OS_STATE = 'OC' AND OS_REGION = #{os_region}

SELECT OS_CODE,OS_DATE,OS_REGION FROM OS WHERE OS_STATE = 'RC' AND OS_REGION = #{os_region}
SELECT OS_CODE,OS_DATE,OS_STATE,OS_REGION FROM OS WHERE OS_STATE = 'EA' OR OS_STATE = 'ER' OR OS_STATE = 'EF' AND OS_REGION = #{os_region}
